name: Cowbots and Roboys
description:
Game Story

Play as a lone cybernetic cowboy and save a town from destruction! Use your gun to shoot and destroy robot cowboys you avoid getting hit.

How to Play

Move: "W, A, S, D"

Shoot: Spacebar

Pause: "P"

Resume: "R" 

Credits

Devin Mahadeo (ID 101171828) - Generalist programmer. Created the initial code of the game and contributed to game design.

Shari Ramos (ID 101354813) - User interface & tools programmer.  Coded other parts of the game such as collision and shooting.

Cristhian Salgado (ID 101152032) - Technical artist/Audio engineer.  Created game art for the states and responsible for all music and SFX.

Emma Peters (ID 100941842) - Technical artist/Game designer. Made the player and enemy sprites along with animations.
